headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: object_type
parameters.description: Object type. Use this field to specify whether you want to get the list of negative keywords for a campaign or ad group. Enum values: CAMPAIGN : campaign. ADGROUP : ad group.

parameters.name: object_id
parameters.description: Object ID. Use this field to pass in a campaign ID or ad group ID that you want to get the list of negative keywords for. Specify this field according to object_type : If object_type is CAMPAIGN , assign a campaign ID to this field. If object_type is ADGROUP , assign an ad group ID to this field.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of pages you want to include the results in. Default value: 1. Value range: â‰¥ 1

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Default value: 10. Value range: [1,50].
